subject: Re: Made it louder,
author: James W. Hyslope
full_text:
I think the main problem with these "BOX" type recordings is that the words are jumbled together (and the voices don't match)....we tend to try to listen for the loudest person to hear(as in natural conditions)At least that's why I can't understand near ALL of them.....Maybe if a person would slow down the recordings with there pc software, even if the voice sounds unatural(they do anyway) at least the seperations between the words will be enough to "seperate" that word. Someone should give it a try. They are loud enough to hear...just can't seperate the syllables--- In EVP-ITC@...m, SnowfireL@... wrote:
>
> Hey, If you guys can't hear this now, I don't know what to do with  you 
> guys and gals, I made this louder so, you should be able to catch everything  
> they are saying.  Love it!  It moves quickly, the 3 guys are saying,  "Rat! 
> Yepper, now two,  "where's the supper at? Parden  mouse, pregnant, yeah.   
> What's makes this so cool is I do have a  pregnant mouse, probably a few of 
> them.  So, this for me is proof  positive!!!  Feel bad for anyone who can't 
> hear this, give me a call and I  will play it over the phone for you.  sf
